page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: My house is eight hundred years old. It is privately owned. It is detached. My house is made from large wooden beams, which you can see, filled in with laths and plaster made of mud and horse hair. It is quite big. We have three bedrooms. In the sitting room the fire place is very big and you can sit inside it close to the fire. We have a big garden with a caravan in it. Our house is {haunted. {I}know this because I have seen the { {ghost.}The house used to be two old cottages until about 35 years ago when they changed it and made it into one house. A vicar used to own the house and he had a tunnel dug leading up to St.Andrew's church. It is under the sitting room floor. Our house is the oldest in Halstead and the oldest cottage in Essex.
